entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
